rows.label: qst002701_msg0001
rows.name: ...Ugh! Cursed Idle Rodonyas!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0002
rows.name:
The medicine is almost
complete, and now I have to
deal with this interference!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0003
rows.name:
Huh? What do you want? I'm
very busy right now. I don't
have time for you...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0004
rows.name: ...Oh? Are you perhaps a Driver?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0005
rows.name: You've come at the perfect time!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0006
rows.name:
I have a little job I'd like to ask
of you. Would you hear me out?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0007
rows.name:
It's not a very difficult job,
and of course, I'll pay you
a more than fair reward!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0008
rows.name:
What do you say? It's
not a bad deal, is it?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0009
rows.name:
...Right. Without an explanation,
it's just too suspicious, isn't it?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0010
rows.name:
The truth is, I'm currently
researching a certain
medicine in top secret.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0011
rows.name:
If I can complete this medicine,
it will be able to save many
people around the world.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0012
rows.name:
...But just as the medicine was
nearing completion, a problem arose.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0013
rows.name:
A flock of Idle Rodonyas has settled
near the place where I can gather the
herbs needed to complete the medicine.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0014
rows.name:
So, I want you to go and defeat
the flock of Idle Rodonyas.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0015
rows.name:
For the sake of people all over the
world, will you take on this job?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0016
rows.name:
Thank you! You are the
hope of the world!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0017
rows.name: ...Heh, so easy.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0018
rows.name:
No! It's nothing! So, about the
location of those Idle Rodonyas...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0019
rows.name: They've settled in the Argan Iceblooms.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm counting on you. Do your best for
the people of the world. ...Heh.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh! Have you already
defeated the Idle Rodonyas?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0102
rows.name: ...Huh? You haven't?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0103
rows.name:
They should be in the Argan Iceblooms.
I'm praying for your success.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0104
rows.name: To save the people of the world.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh! You've defeated them properly!
I was right to ask you!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0202
rows.name:
Yes, now I can finally
complete the medicine!
Yes... finally the medicine...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0203
rows.name:
...Ufufu, ufufufu.
Ufufufufufufufufufufu.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0204
rows.name:
It's been a long time... Yes, a
very long and arduous journey...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0205
rows.name:
But with this! Finally! I will be
rewarded! I can be with my beloved!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0206
rows.name:
My long-held love! The day has
finally come for it to be rewarded!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0207
rows.name: Let's ask a question.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0208
rows.name: Ask if saving the world was a lie.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0209
rows.name: Ask what kind of medicine she made.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0210
rows.name: No, it's not a lie!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0211
rows.name:
If this medicine is mass-produced,
no one in the world will have
to suffer from love!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0212
rows.name:
Everyone can have their
love fulfilled with this
medicine and be happy!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0213
rows.name:
Of course, that includes me. I
will truly love my beloved.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0214
rows.name:
Fine! I'll tell you, as a special
treat! A reward for helping me!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0215
rows.name:
The medicine I was researching is a
magical potion that makes anyone who
drinks it fall in love instantly...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0216
rows.name: A love potion!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0217
rows.name:
I will use this medicine
to truly love my beloved!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0218
rows.name: You've been a great help to me!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0219
rows.name:
This is your promised reward.
Please accept it, won't you?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0220
rows.name:
Thank you, my little Cupid! I'll let
you know if it works out! Hehe!
